title: config
description: Configuration options for Doc Detective operations.

input.description: Path(s) to test specifications and documentation source files. May be paths to specific files or to directories to scan for files.

output.description: Path of the directory in which to store the output of Doc Detective commands. If a file path is specified, Doc Detective attempts to honor the file name specified, but file path behavior is controlled by the configured reporters.

recursive.description: If `true` searches `input`, `setup`, and `cleanup` paths recursively for test specifications and source files.

relativePathBase.description: Whether paths should be interpreted as relative to the current working directory (`cwd`) or to the file in which they're specified (`file`).

origin.description: Default protocol and domain to use for relative URLs.

beforeAny.description: Path(s) to test specifications to perform before those specified by `input`. Useful for setting up testing environments.

afterAll.description: Path(s) to test specifications to perform after those specified by `input`. Useful for cleaning up testing environments.

detectSteps.description: Whether or not to detect steps in input files based on defined markup.

allowUnsafeSteps.description: Whether or not to run potentially unsafe steps, such as those that might modify files or system state.

crawl.description: If `true`, crawls sitemap.xml files specified by URL to find additional files to test.

processDitaMaps.description: If `true`, processes DITA maps and includes generated files as inputs.

logLevel.description: Amount of detail to output when performing an operation.

fileTypes.description: Configuration for file types and their markup detection.

anyOf.$comment: Simple mode: Reference predefined templates by name.
anyOf.title: File type (predefined)

anyOf.$comment: Custom mode: Extend predefined templates or write whole new ones.
anyOf.title: File type (custom)

extensions.description: File extensions to use with type.

markup.description: Markup definitions for the file type.

anyOf.title: File type (executable)
anyOf.$comment: Executable mode: Convert executable inputs directly into tests.

extensions.description: File extensions to use with type.

runShell.description: `runShell` step to perform for this file type. Use $1 as a placeholder for the file path.

integrations.description: Options for connecting to external services.

docDetectiveApi.description: Configuration for Doc Detective Orchestration API integration.

apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with the Doc Detective Orchestration API.

docDetectiveApi.title: Doc Detective Orchestration API

heretto.description: Configuration for Heretto CMS integrations. Each entry specifies a Heretto instance and a scenario to build and test.

name.description: Unique identifier for this Heretto integration. Used in logs and results.

organizationId.description: The organization subdomain used to access Heretto CCMS (e.g., 'thunderbird' for thunderbird.heretto.com).

username.description: Heretto CCMS username (email address) for API authentication.

apiToken.description: API token generated in Heretto CCMS for authentication. See https://help.heretto.com/en/heretto-ccms/api/ccms-api-authentication/basic-authentication#ariaid-title3

scenarioName.description: Name of the scenario to build and test.

outputPath.description: Local path where Heretto content was downloaded. Set automatically during processing.

fileMapping.description: Mapping of local file paths to Heretto file metadata. Set automatically during content loading.

fileId.description: The UUID of the file in Heretto.

filePath.description: The path of the file in Heretto.

uploadOnChange.description: If `true`, uploads changed screenshots and other media files back to Heretto CMS after test execution.

resourceDependencies.description: Mapping of Heretto file paths to their UUIDs and metadata. Set automatically during content loading by fetching ditamap resource dependencies.

uuid.description: The UUID of the file in Heretto.

fullPath.description: The full xmldb path of the file in Heretto.

parentFolderId.description: The UUID of the parent folder in Heretto.

heretto.title: Heretto CMS integrations

integrations.title: Integrations options

telemetry.description: Options around sending telemetry for Doc Detective usage.

userId.description: Identifier for the organization, group, or individual running Doc Detective.

telemetry.title: Telemetry options

concurrentRunners.description: Number of concurrent test runners. Set to true to use CPU core count (capped at 4).

debug.description: Enable debugging mode. `true` allows pausing on breakpoints, waiting for user input before continuing. `stepThrough` pauses at every step, waiting for user input before continuing. `false` disables all debugging.

environment.description: Environment information for the system running Doc Detective.

workingDirectory.description: The current working directory of the process running Doc Detective.

platform.description: The operating system type running Doc Detective.

arch.description: The processor architecture of the system running Doc Detective.

environment.title: Environment details

regex.description: Regular expressions to match the markup type.

batchMatches.description: If `true`, all matches are combined into a single string.

actions.description: Actions to perform when the markup type is detected.

inlineStatements.description: Statements to include tests and steps inside the content of the file, such as within Markdown.

testStart.description: Regular expressions that indicate the start of a test. If capture groups are used, the first capture group is used for the statement. If no capture groups are used, the entire match is used for the statement.

testEnd.description: Regular expressions that indicate that the current test is complete.

ignoreStart.description: Regular expressions that indicates that the following content should be ignored for testing purposes.

ignoreEnd.description: Regular expressions that indicate that the ignored section of content is complete.

step.description: Regular expressions that indicate a step in a test.

inlineStatements.title: Inline statement definition
